title: Guess The Word Game
description: This challenge is great to advance your JavaScript skills. The challenge is to create a small game that test your data management with JavaScript.

userStories.content: Create a guess the word game that matches the given design.
Use HTML to create basic structure.
Add image, title, author, progress bar, player button,... according to the design.
Users should be able to see random scrambled word when the page is first loaded or after users click the random button.
Users should be able to enter a letter at a time, after each time, the input should automatically focus on the next input if exist.
Users should be able to see the number of wrong answers (tries) and which the wrong answers are (mistakes).
Users should be able to regenerate a new scrambled by selecting random button.
Users should be able to reset all input, mistakes, tries but selecting reset button.
When the number of tries or mistakes reach 6, the game should be reset.
When user complete the game, it should show a 'ðŸŽ‰ Success' alert.
The page should be responsive on different screen sizes.
